title: IHCâ€™s 3 new judges take oath
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 1 (APP): The three additional judges of Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Thursday took oath of their offices after their services were regularized.
IHC Chief Justice Aamir Farooq administered oath from the judges during a ceremony in IHC.
Justice Sardar Ejaz Ishaq Khan, Justice Arbab Muhammad Tahir and Justice Saman Riffat Imtiaz had been appointed as regular judges at the IHC.
Judges of high court and sessions courts, legal fraternity and journalists attended the oath-taking ceremony.
